website_summaries.verdict: The Epson EX5240 XGA 3LCD Projector provides solid data-image quality and better-than-average video quality for use in a small room.
pros: Good video quality for a data projector

customer_reviews.title: beware if you are thinking of using wireless, extra expenses required.
customer_reviews.text: Turns out you need to purchase an additional $100 adapter to use this wireless. I reviewed the product description on Amazon and on the Epson site again after confirming this with Epson tech support. Both neglect to mention this, and infer the thing is wireless ready out of the box. Very misleading advertising. I wonder what other "features" await discovery.
customer_reviews.author: RT Farms

customer_reviews.title: $100 extra to use wireless feature
customer_reviews.text: Be warned- if you would like to use the wireless feature on this projector, then you will need to purchase an additional part for $100. That was not clear to me at the time of purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sadie

customer_reviews.title: Best projector I have ever had in terms of colors
customer_reviews.text: AH-MAZING product. Best projector I have ever had in terms of colors, crispness, and ability to adjust the image. The ONLY FLAW is that the speakers are crap, so you need to have audio cords to connect alternative speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Chanel T

customer_reviews.title: The picture clarity is awesome. It works well with any HDMI input including ...
customer_reviews.text: The picture clarity is awesome. It works well with any HDMI input including Chromcast. The only reason I gave a 4 star and not 5 star is because this projector does not have audio output. It has only an audio RCA input. If you need to connect to external speakers you will have to connect the source of video to external speakers. If you use an HDMI input like chromcast, you probably need to buy HDMI video audio splitter (around 25$ on amazon) to stream only video through projector and audio to your speakers/sound bar. Hope this this helps.
customer_reviews.author: chsrivedhanreddy

customer_reviews.title: It's easy to use and an effective business tool
customer_reviews.text: I've been using it weekly for business meetings plus the occasional home movie with the kids. It's easy to use and an effective business tool. The unit provides the ability to shut off the lamp instantly and then turn it on right away (with the use of a slide panel) without having to wait for the lamp to power up or cool down. That is a really nice feature that has not been available on other projectors I have used. It has great tools also that allow you to easilly adjust your image when the projection is off-center. Overall... great projection unit
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Another great Epson projector EX5260
customer_reviews.text: Our last projector was an 81P. We used it 4 hours a week for more than 12 years with maybe 1 re-lamp. Then had to replace due to greening (burning of the UV lens adhesive due to age). The 3,600 lumen vs the deteriorated 2,000 was no comparison. Even the older people in the room made first time statements that they could see all of the wording on the screen. Colors during dark and bright house lighting are nothing short of excellent. Well worth the purchase and less than 1/2 what was paid for the 81P 12 years ago when it was new. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: jewellsmommy

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this projector for the use of our church. It easily does the job for worship, sermons, and video clips. There are a few things that I would like to mention that I like about this Epson. First, it has a switch that can project the screen sideways instead of having to be right in front of where you are projecting. Next. it is easy to enlarge or make smaller by another switch. Third, you can easily adjust the legs or height of the projector for use. Overall, I would say, "User Friendly".
customer_reviews.author: Charles Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Great Projector
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our church, to run our bulletins, it wasn’t hard to set up and connect with an USB cable, but was very complicated to set up using the WiFi, as the instructions aren’t clear or we were just confused, had to get a computer expert to set it up wireless, after that it was perfect and has been going strong, highly recommend but the WIFi hook up might take you awhile if you are a novice. The reason for the three stars for the remote we have to be about a foot from the projector to control it, our projector is mounted on the ceiling other than that the remote is of good quality and works very well
customer_reviews.author: Ms G

customer_reviews.title: This projector won't disappoint !
customer_reviews.text: This projector was purchased to replace an Epson EX50, 2200 Lumen, projector we acquired in 2008. The rebuilt EX5240 was less expensive than a new model, is a 1000 lumens brighter (plus the decreased output from our aging bulbs, and the EX5240 also has an hdmi port, supporting newer laptops. We used this as a primary projector at a conference and were very please. It's only drawback is it's lower resolution than newed projectors. all in all I highly recommend this unit
customer_reviews.author: David S

customer_reviews.title: Poor longevity
customer_reviews.text: This unit only worked for 4 days, I used it 4 times over 4 months when the lamp light and overheating light came on and would not produce a light. I changed the light bulb and the unit did the same thing on the 4th use the unit would run for approx 3-4 min and then the unit would not work and the lights would come on. Of course it has been 3 months so Amazon will not allow it to be returned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Support availability kacking
customer_reviews.text: Product works okay, however the only support available is through "authorized" shops. I live in Las Vegas and have to send it to Anaheim California 200+ miles for support. I contacted Epson support who told me they do not provide parts to other projector repair shops. check for available support before you buy. I use it as an instructor and the idea that I cannot get it service locally is a major negative.
customer_reviews.author: Retired LA cop

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my parents who use it for business meetings. It is really good, the wuality of the image and the control also works. I just can't get around the wifi configuration so far have only used it with hdmi
customer_reviews.author: YC

customer_reviews.title: To Not Order
customer_reviews.text: Project went bad after two months. Epson agreed to send new projector after two hour service call. New projector arrived without lamp and I am being told I will need to waited two to three weeks for a lamp. I am being told to call back and check on arrival every week. Totally unacceptable!!!'
customer_reviews.author: Jim Z.

customer_reviews.title: Buying a second one for my brother.
customer_reviews.text: Everything is perfect. The projector was like new with everything I needed. I got the four year warranty which made me more confident. Indoor and outdoor movies.
customer_reviews.author: In DC

customer_reviews.title: Great image quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this projector for my office to replace an old one we had. It have very high resolution, great for working on Excel and numbers. The lamp is so bright you can see it well even with lights on. Actually, with lights off it is kind of too bright.
customer_reviews.author: RDU23

customer_reviews.title: Nice little projector
customer_reviews.text: Nice little projector. Used it in a large conference room with 120 attendees and a 10x7 screen. Even with slightly subdued lighting the picture quality was excellent. Easy to set up and use. Did not use speaker as the sound was "weak", but as we had a P.A system I redirected sound to the mixer. All in all good value for the price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The clarity of the projection is great. The wireless feature is a bit harder to ...
customer_reviews.text: The clarity of the projection is great. The wireless feature is a bit harder to figure out. We purchased this projector to use it during board meetings so I have not been able to use it outside of a room. In a well lit room, the projection was clear.
customer_reviews.author: dan

customer_reviews.title: This product is great. The set up was pretty easy except for ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is great. The set up was pretty easy except for the figuring out how to turn the screen direction to a ceiling mount. I had to google the manual as this projector only came with quick start setup.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn Chroniger

customer_reviews.title: I upgraded from one model lower than this and they ...
customer_reviews.text: I upgraded from one model lower than this and they are about the same. To get high quality HD video you probably need to spend $1000 or more.
customer_reviews.author: dddpc10

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wifi and network setup is not easy and setup information is very limited.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is ok
customer_reviews.text: it is good quality, but I wish it has more functions and can be connect to phone directly.
customer_reviews.author: Jush Owen

customer_reviews.title: Great improvement over the Flylinktech that I returned
customer_reviews.text: Great improvement over the Flylinktech that I returned. Have seen sharper projectors, but for the money it's pretty good. Very little light fall off in economy mode, and when in economy mode it is very quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Clay

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase for the money
customer_reviews.text: Excellent purchase for the money. I use it mostly for Power Point presentations and some videos. Very pleased with performance and function.
customer_reviews.author: Trey

customer_reviews.title: I now watch TV 7 feet wide.  I only wish I had a larger wall.
customer_reviews.text: It works great. I had a an earlier model that I used for years, so I had confidence that it would make me happy.
customer_reviews.author: John Stilwell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It has an amazing picture me and my husband watch movies outside. It has a great picture.
customer_reviews.author: Luiza

customer_reviews.title: It works great. I replaced an older model and this works ...
customer_reviews.text: It works great. I replaced an older model and this works and projects much clearer and brighter.
customer_reviews.author: old professor

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great projector, wireless connection works well, great brightness and color
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Andra Howard

customer_reviews.title: Great Projector, Great Price
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a computer projector to use without having to turn out the lights, here it is. Great price and works great. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Manuel

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: The wifi connection should play videos. The image Quality it's very Nice!!!
customer_reviews.author: Santiago Leiva

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice picture to include while projecting in well lit room. image, as good as my 55 inch 1080p HDTV
customer_reviews.author: barram

customer_reviews.title: The good news is that I can plug in my laptop ...
customer_reviews.text: I think this projector will be exactly what I need. I have used it only a couple of times, but the images are sharp, the color bright. The good news is that I can plug in my laptop and do a PowerPoint presentation by myself, and without having to borrow someone else's machine.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Huxford

customer_reviews.title: Easy to operate
customer_reviews.text: Easy to operate. I like that the buttons on top are easy to see and read, unlike the digital display on some other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid choice, very bright.
customer_reviews.text: Solid bright projector. Exactly what you think it should be.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Works well so far
customer_reviews.text: Still figuring out all the features, but IRS up and running
customer_reviews.author: SJC

customer_reviews.title: Picture is good and very bright
customer_reviews.text: Fan was really loud in my movie room. Finally went into settings and adjusted eco mode and it reduced the fan to a slower speed. Picture is good and very bright.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NOT WIRELESS!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very misleading advertisement. To be wireless it will cost $100-$120 for an LAN adapter. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Longhurst

customer_reviews.title: Plenty bright with great color.
customer_reviews.text: Just right for our 200 seat church auditorium. Plenty bright with great color.
customer_reviews.author: Ted W.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: really bright and adjustable. I use it for blowing up photos/sketches for painting. Works really well!
customer_reviews.author: Sian W.

customer_reviews.title: Affordable church projector
customer_reviews.text: Reliable and easily installed at our church as a rear projector. We are satisfied with the video quality.
customer_reviews.author: Old Genio

customer_reviews.title: Love this projector
customer_reviews.text: Love this projector. I plugged it in, connected it to my computer and it worked! A first for me with electronics of any kind. We used it at an event in a hotel meeting room and the image was exceptional. We also loved the angle lens that allowed us to position the projector in a more convenient spot and still have a perfect image. I strongly recommend this projector over the many others I've used. No AV help from the hotel needed which is another first for us.
customer_reviews.author: Susan L. Rink

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Lot of options for set-up. Excellent brightness. Easy initialization. Carry bag could have been made bigger to hold accessories/cables. Excellent product. Buttons on remote are really small. Excellent price through Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: EGL-Birch

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for our meetings. Easy to follow directions. Clear picture display
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great projector
customer_reviews.text: This projector has worked flawlessly since day one. Easy to hook up to your PC for any presentation.
customer_reviews.author: G Adair

customer_reviews.title: Great picture... not enough zoom on picture size
customer_reviews.text: Projector color is incredible! However we are using it as a ceiling mount projector and already have a mount that was used for the previous projector. The problem is the location of the mount is a little too far back and the projector image is too big for our screen. Assumed this projector would have more of a zoom adjustment but it is very minimal. It's looking like we are going to end up having to return this projector in hopes of finding one that has more ability to zoom so we can fit the picture on our screen.
customer_reviews.author: kgpreacher

customer_reviews.title: Look here if you need a presentation machine.
customer_reviews.text: The biggest question was the brightness. It shows clear and bright! Exactly what someone needs to do presentations.
customer_reviews.author: Victor H.

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. Works well with lighting
customer_reviews.text: Use this for classroom presentations. I had it mounted on the ceiling. So far so good. Works well with lighting. No longer have to close blinds in order to see the presentations. I like that there is a USB port available for use without a computer. The problem with this is it doesn't work and there are no instructions to help me to get it to work. When I clicked on my file it would not open. I wish there were better instructions for making this work. Since Epson is near my neighborhood, I will go there to get help.
customer_reviews.author: Ms V

customer_reviews.title: Make sure remote is right for your needs
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to set up tovuse WIFI, will not connect automatically with phone.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent easy to use works well with HDMI, have doen presentations in well lit rooms very effectively.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce W Cortis

customer_reviews.title: GOOD PROJECTOR
customer_reviews.text: The projector has all the features I needed and I'm very pleased with it
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Roy E. Sprague

customer_reviews.title: Wishing for the best!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the refurbished model. No issues as of yet. Fast shipping and all accessories included! Wishing for the best!
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Great business tool
customer_reviews.text: Works great for presentations that I've given at restaurants for my Plexus business.
customer_reviews.author: Debra OT

customer_reviews.title: 5 Star Projector From Epson
customer_reviews.text: Great projector, Epson did a nice update on this model I had the last model for 5 years before the bulb burnt out. I use projectors as normal TV everyday so 5 years of use was amazing i thought. I am very happy with the quality its like watching tv at a movie theater. I would recommend this projector to anyone that wants to do a DIY media room in there house on a budget. Great product,
customer_reviews.author: Beyond_Limits

customer_reviews.title: Good but
customer_reviews.text: So far no problems- still trying to figure out how to output audio on speakers
customer_reviews.author: txsweetheart01

customer_reviews.title: This was a last minute purchase, it arrived a ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a last minute purchase, it arrived a day of our departure and it was worth it...thank you AMAZON
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to use for a non-techie
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use for a non-techie. Great for Power Point. Pictures clear and colors bright. Classes are so much better with these slide shows!
customer_reviews.author: Judy R

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great, easy to connect, nice bright images. I recommend. Wireless makes it easier too. I approve.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Demuth

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to setup, sharp, bright picture, every connectors you could need.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur J. Downey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought 4 of these for office travel - perfect size and price
customer_reviews.author: Nipahc

customer_reviews.title: Excellent but don't expect everyrhing you might desire from wifi.
customer_reviews.text: Excelent machine but the wifi aspects are limited. (Thus 4 instead of 5 stars). Used in a church in daylight - excellent luminosity. This is obviously very important and quite a plus for a church community enviornment without having to spend a lot more money. Have no basis for comparisons but this community is very satisfied with our purchase. (Because of so much doubt about authentic evaluations, this is from an American cleric in Caracas!) To each his own!
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo

customer_reviews.title: I used this ion courtroom, and I had a ...
customer_reviews.text: I used this ion courtroom, and I had a lot of issues with the HDMI output using a macbook pro. VGA output was ok.
customer_reviews.author: T & M

customer_reviews.title: Possibly the best projector for watching movies outside
customer_reviews.text: After using a projector that did an okay job I bought this one so we can watch movies on the 12' blow up screen. This projector amazed us. The 3200 lumens meant we could start movies earlier as the sun was going down instead of waiting until dark. It auto adjusts to the angle you are aiming at and was extremely quiet. Would definitely buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Amie Ware

customer_reviews.title: The brightness is insane and for the money it's a great picture. I was able to finding for around ...
customer_reviews.text: Incredible projector! The brightness is insane and for the money it's a great picture. I was able to finding for around $400 and I feel I got more then I was expecting. Then only problem is that it doesn't play videos off of a USB stick. You can get an adapter but it's just one more step. Another problem is that you can't be online and use the wireless feature at the same time. I believe there is a solution here but I haven't found it yet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value because it is a good product!
customer_reviews.text: Needed a projector for day and night projection, and the reviews were good for this one. It is very good for daylight and even better for night. Good value because it is a good product!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: On April 19, 2016 I bought the projector pro ...
customer_reviews.text: On April 19, 2016 I bought the projector pro ex5250 and today April 10, 2017 it went out and did not light anymore. According to the indication has 2 years of guarantee but I have visited the page of the epson and by now I have encintrado how to make it valid. Good, as I apply the guarantee of this project
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo  Leahy R.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product, fast delivery, great price, and outstanding quality. Will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Vera

customer_reviews.title: Small, light and practically silent in ECO power mode
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for the bedroom, already having a electric projector screen drop from the ceiling. The color brightness is very good and the projector is practically silent when running in ECO power mode but still plenty bright!! The zoom control lets us set up a 100" screen with a 11 foot throw and the projector is small and light so it is not obvious above the bed headboard. We use it to watch Amazon Prime, Netflix etc.. using a thin long HDMI cable to our laptop but could probably use the Wifi connection instead, just never tried it..
customer_reviews.author: Dave B

customer_reviews.title: it is perfect. If you are needing it for presentations
customer_reviews.text: I am using this for movies in the back yard. For that, it is perfect. If you are needing it for presentations, with small print letters, then maybe it's not for you.
customer_reviews.author: Alan petty

customer_reviews.title: This projector is easy to use and produces a clear image in rather ...
customer_reviews.text: FABULOUS! This projector is easy to use and produces a clear image in rather bright spaces. I love it. I would buy 10 more if I could.
customer_reviews.author: sandpiper

customer_reviews.title: Nice equipment
customer_reviews.text: Works well, easy to set up. Have not used it that much so far
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Great projector
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with how bright this is. Comparable to much more expensive units.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Rodi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought this item for a church and they are loving it
customer_reviews.author: SNG

customer_reviews.title: I am a firearm instructor and purchased this for my ...
customer_reviews.text: I am a firearm instructor and purchased this for my classes. WOW! It knocks any PowerPoint out of the park in terms of brightness and sharpness, regardless of the room conditions. The only issue I have not yet figured out is using the Epson wireless LAN. Will let you know once that is working.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good picture quality and easy to set up. My kids enjoyed the super bowl game this year...
customer_reviews.author: AruAyu

customer_reviews.title: Yellowing issue
customer_reviews.text: After the third use the top and right potion of the projection have yellowed. What can I do to fix this? Connected via HDMI to my Dell Studio 15
customer_reviews.author: Melton

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is just perfect to carry for presentations and easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: P. Darlene Sawyer

customer_reviews.title: Business not Home Theater!
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a home theater projector do not choose this unit. If you are looking for a business projector for presentations this is the unit for you!
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really a good projector, clear light and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel J Austin

customer_reviews.title: Great projectors!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome projectors, we have two running in our church, using a long HDMI cable run with boosters, and a Y-splitter to project to both projectors at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BEST BUY......EVER!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: So far, this thing is awesome!! I need to get a larger screen. Everything looks good with this, even with my sliding glass door with blackout curtains being slightly open I can still see things in extreme detail.
customer_reviews.author: R&S Chatman

customer_reviews.title: Epson EX260 XGA Projector
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for projecting a display on my garage window for Halloween and Christmas...works absolutely great...I get many compliments. The top of the window in the photo is the projector and the bottom is just a window box with lighted decorations.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Scanlon

product_meta.title: Epson EX5240, XGA, 3200 Lumens Color Brightness, 3200 Lumens White Brightness, 3LCD Projector
product_meta.description: Style:EX5240The proven, portable projector for compelling presentations. 3200 lumens color brightness and 3200 lumens white brightness. Fast setup; HDMI.
feature_bullets: Look for two numbers: 3000 lumens Color Brightness for more accurate, vivid color 3000 lumens White Brightness for well-lit rooms
XGA resolution (1024 x 768) offers 1.5x more resolution than SVGA for projecting advanced presentations with text-heavy charts and spreadsheets
Fast, easy setup, only from Epson - get up and running in no time with easy image adjustments and convenient control
Compatible with the latest laptops and media players - supports HDMI, the standard in connectivity, for digital video and audio with just one cable

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars243 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
